title: [COACHING] Looking for a team (Platinum+) for free coaching!
body:
**First point to note:** _I have no experience as a coach to date._

**Introduction to me!**
My name is President, I have been teaching myself about rotations and everything there is to know about coaching, and helping teams progress.
I am particularly interested in how teams work on an emotional level. How does a team lift its spirit when suffering a defeat?

**Things I will help with, but you don't have to use:**
Champion Select (comms is needed)
Team Compositions (figuring out what champions you all play and making compositions around that)
Match Filming (I will be watching the game and taking notes on what happened, and how we can improve game-play)

If you would like to talk about your teams progression, please add me on league.
**President Blood**

replies.body: Hey man I'll add you tonight and we can talk
Can't add you for some reason can you add me please
Msg me, currently putting togeather a serious team with emphasis around prior prep, communication and psychology.
